name: Cyber Danganronpa VR: The Class Trial
name_original: Cyber Danganronpa VR: The Class Trial
description:
Cyber Danganronpa VR: The Class Trial is an adventure game. It came out on 13-10-2016. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Cyber Danganronpa VR: The Class Trial on PlayStation 4.
Yoshinori Terasawa produced the game. Toyokazu Sakamoto directed the game.
